staff:
<%
try
{
	_qid = Request.QueryString.qid;
}
catch(_qid_fucked_)
{
	_qid = "";
}

if (_qid != "")
{
	_query = "for $collaborator in collaborators where contains($collaborator/fullname, '"+_qid+"') return $collaborator";
	_collaborators = XQuery(_query);


	for (_collaborator in _collaborators)
	{
%>
	<collaborator id="<%=_collaborator.id%>" fullname="<%=_collaborator.fullname%>" login="<%=_collaborator.login%>" email="<%=_collaborator.email%>" position_id="<%=_collaborator.position_id%>" position_name="<%=_collaborator.position_name%>" org_id="_collaborator.org_id" org_name="<%=_collaborator.org_name%>"/>
<%
	}
}
%>
